title: How to Add Places to Google Maps + Add Labels to Addresses

steps.title: Open Google Maps.
steps.content: Open Google Maps. Tap the Google Maps app icon, which resembles a red, blue, green, and yellow location pin. If prompted, select an account or enter your email address and password before continuing.

steps.title: Tap Contribute.
steps.content: Tap Contribute . You'll see this with a + at the bottom of your screen. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Add place.
steps.content: Tap Add place . It's near the top of the page, under your name. It has an icon of a location pin with a +.

steps.title: Fill in the location's information.
steps.content: Fill in the location's information. You'll want to add the name of the place, categorize it, and give it an address. Tap the name field and enter that place's name. You'll need to spell the place's name exactly as you want it to appear. For example, make sure you use the right capitalization and punctuation (if there is any) in "Toys"R"Us". Tap the category field to add if it's Shopping/Book Store or residential/apartment complex. Enter an address by tapping the address field, then type in the street address of the place. Make sure you include the city, state, and ZIP code if necessary. You can also tap the location icon (it looks like a circular cross-hairs symbol) to use your current location. The more information that you include here, the quicker Google will be able to verify the place's existence. If the location is located within another building (like a store inside of a mall), add that information in the "Located within" field.

steps.title: Add more information (optional).
steps.content: Add more information (optional). Tap Add more details and you can add the following non-essential information about your place: [2] X Research source Phone number: Tap the Phone text box, then type in your place's phone number. If you're not sure if this is actually their phone number, don't use it. Website: Tap the Website text box, then enter the place's website address. Hours: Tap Hours to add the hours the business is open, if you know them. Add photos to your submission by tapping Add Photos under "Place photos". You can look through your gallery and tap the photos you want to submit.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . It's in the bottom right corner of the screen. Doing so will submit your request to Google. You should receive an email regarding whether or not your submission was accepted within two weeks. If any of your submitted information is incorrect, like the place's hours or phone number, your submission could be denied.

steps.title: Open Google Maps.
steps.content: Open Google Maps. Go to google.com/maps in your browser. If you're signed into Google Maps, you can add a place from this website. If you aren't signed in yet, click Sign in in the top-right corner of the page and enter your Google email address and password before continuing.

steps.title: Click the three horizontal lines in the upper-right corner.
steps.content: Click the three horizontal lines in the upper-right corner. This will open a side panel menu.

steps.title: Click Add a missing place.
steps.content: Click Add a missing place . It's in the menu, under the Print button. The "Add a place" window will open.

steps.title: Fill in the location's information.
steps.content: Fill in the location's information. You'll want to add the name of the place, categorize it, and give it an address. Click the name field and enter that place's name. You'll need to spell the place's name exactly as you want it to appear. Click the category field to add if it's Shopping/Book Store or residential/apartment complex. Enter an address by clicking the address field, then type in the street address of the place. Make sure you include the city, state, and ZIP code if necessary. You can also click the location icon (it looks like a circular cross-hairs symbol) to use your current location. The more information that you include here, the quicker Google will be able to verify the place's existence. If the location is located within another building (like a store inside of a mall), add that information in the "Located within" field.

steps.title: Add more information (optional).
steps.content: Add more information (optional). Click Add more details and you can add the following non-essential information about your place: Phone number: Click the Phone text box, then type in your place's phone number. If you're not sure if this is actually their phone number, don't use it. Website: Click the Website text box, then enter the place's website address. Hours: Click Hours to add the hours the business is open, if you know them. You can add photos to your submission by clicking Add photos under "Add more." This will open your file manager so you can find the picture in your computer's local storage.

steps.title: Click Submit.
steps.content: Click Submit . It's in the bottom right corner of the screen. Doing so will submit your request to Google. You should receive an email regarding whether or not your submission was accepted within two weeks. If any of your submitted information is incorrect, like the place's hours or phone number, your submission could be denied. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Open Google Maps.
steps.content: Open Google Maps. Tap the Google Maps app icon, which resembles a red, blue, green, and yellow location pin. If prompted, select an account or enter your email address and password before continuing.

steps.title: Search for an address.
steps.content: Search for an address. Alternatively, you can tap and hold a place on the map to drop a pin.

steps.title: Tap More > Add label.
steps.content: Tap More > Add label . To find the More menu, horizontally scroll the buttons under the address name and info.

steps.title: Give a name to the label.
steps.content: Give a name to the label. Once you're done, tap the Done button in the upper-right corner. The label will now be searchable in your Google Maps so you can find it easily. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Open Google Maps.
steps.content: Open Google Maps. Go to google.com/maps in your browser. If you're signed into Google Maps, you can add a place from this website. If you aren't signed in yet, click Sign in in the top-right corner of the page and enter your Google email address and password before continuing.

steps.title: Search for an address.
steps.content: Search for an address. Alternatively, you can click anywhere on the map, then click the name of the address at the bottom of the page to drop a pin.

steps.title: Click Add a label.
steps.content: Click Add a label . It's under the address. You may have to scroll to find the option if you're adding a label to a business, as there are a number of options to choose from.

steps.title: Give a name to the label.
steps.content: Give a name to the label. Once you're done, click Add a label under the text field to add it. The label will now be searchable in your Google Maps so you can find it easily.
